text: Yes please I’d love to test this!!
do HubSpot transactional emails come from the same domain as marketing emails but just a dedicated IP address?

Seems to be that way from HubSpot’s information:

<https://www.HubSpot.com/products/marketing/transactional-email>

`During the dedicated IP setup, you can customize your new IP with your company's domain, so the recipient servers recognize the emails as coming from your company's domain rather than from HubSpot's domain.`

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/how-to-use-transactional-email-in-HubSpot>
